LanguageData.JAR_Feline_FactionGreetingHostile: {0} roars a string of curses into the microphone and disconnects.
LanguageData.JAR_Feline_FactionGreetingHostileAppreci: Roars angrily, {0} demands that you make a gesture of unity, like bringing gifts to one of {0_possessive} settlements or releasing {0_possessive} faction's prisoners unharmed. Until then, {0_pronoun} is unwilling to talk.\n\nRoaring an insult, {0_pronoun} disconnects.
LanguageData.JAR_Feline_FactionGreetingWary: {0} roars a greeting and asks what business you need done.
LanguageData.JAR_Feline_FactionGreetingWarm: Mewuls enthusiastically, {0} greets {NEGOTIATOR_labelShort} and asks what {LEADER_pronoun} can do to help you.
LanguageData.JAR_Feline_MilitaryAidSent: {0} agrees to send Feline fighters to help you.
